channel.title: Need coder
channel.description: Hey guys! I read all these forums and I think I would like to work with RSPS, but I can't edit or make servers, because I don't know anything, just some things like running server, making mod, admin, changin cmds... So, I need your help with making/editing server. My Skype: rokiz_ltu Plz help!

item.title: Need coder
item.dc:creator: @starstorm starstorm
item.description:
@starstorm wrote:

i see so the problem might be is that ur using a compiler someone made that they tested with linux so heres mine that might work…

@echo off title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
sorry ur gunna have to change it to ur version of java but thats the latest so u should be fine, just right click compiler then click edit and replace ur whole code with this

Read full topic

item.title: Need coder
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

Ah so you are using Linux? I’m sorry but I’m new to Linux, but i’m guessing that you’ll need to set your environment variables.

Read full topic

item.title: Need coder
item.dc:creator: @hyperMan hyperMan
item.description:
@hyperMan wrote:

durial12:

Post what is in your compiler (right click, open with, notepad) and show me what java update you have.

Right click on my compiler and select Opne with? I can’t… There is no option Open with… Please help!

Edit:
Maybe like this?
#!/bin/bash

Tested with: SuSE Linux 10.0

Requires java path be stored in $PATH

Usage:

Enter the following in terminal before first usage:

"chmod +x compile.sh && chmod +x run.sh

javac -classpath . -d bin *.java -g

And I think I have Java update 1.6.0_17 or smth

Read full topic

item.description:
